How Users Work with a Prompt Template

As a Salesforce administrator, you configure prompt templates to make tasks easier for your users. This section explains how your users can apply these prompt templates to write emails, generate case summaries, complete text form fields, and more.

Give Users Access to a Prompt Template
Prepare your users to harness the power of Einstein generative AI. Manage who can use prompt templates with permission sets. Add sales email prompt templates to Einstein for Sales, and add field generation prompt templates to dynamic fields in pages built with Lightning App Builder.
Localizing Prompt Template Responses
Prompt Builder localizes generated content automatically. If a user’s language is one of the supported languages, LLM responses are localized into that language by default.
Sales Email Prompt Templates in Action
Einstein generative AI helps you draft a personalized email. Your org’s custom sales email prompt templates automatically appear as options in the Lightning Experience email composer. Before you send an Einstein Sales Email, review the email draft and edit it, if needed.
Field Generation Prompt Templates in Action
With generative AI-enabled fields, you can get real-time data from across your org without leaving a Lightning page. Generative AI-enabled fields use field generation prompt templates to provide dynamic summaries, descriptions, and more.
Flex Prompt Templates in Action
Flex prompt templates are specific to your use cases, so call them wherever you need them in your org. Build custom UI or use REST API to call them with an invocable action.
Integrate Prompt Templates with Salesforce Features
You can call a prompt template through an invocable action anywhere on the Salesforce Platform or by using the Connect REST API or Connect in Apex.
